Product title: MaisoNovo Shampoo and Conditioner Dispenser - Shower Soap Dispenser Wall Mounted - 16.9 fl oz Set of 3 Black Plastic Bottles Black Plastic Pump - Shampoo Dispenser, Shower Dispenser
Key Features: This Pack Includes: Three (3) extra-thick PET plastic black bottles shower soap dispenser which can hold 16.9 fl oz/500ml; three (3) wall-mount brackets with adhesive; six (6) decal waterproof labels including decal shampoo, conditioner, body wash in margaux and for your shower dispenser 3 chamber no drill shampoo dispenser wall mount. | Quality Materials: Designed in the U.S.A and made with ISO14001 environmental standard, the set features fortified 55g PET plastic bottles shower soap dispenser wall mounted and waterproof labels that are durable in humid environments. This shampoo holder for shower wall is the perfect addition to your home with a body wash dispenser for shower bathroom. | No Drilling & Easy to Install: The hand soap dispenser pumps or soap dispenser wall mount can be installed on any smooth surface for your shampoo conditioner body wash dispenser. Our drill-free technology ensures the dispensers stay firmly wall-mounted. No more drilling into your beautiful bathroom tiles! It can also be removed without leaving behind any sticky residue. | Ideal for Residential and Commercial Use: Whether it is for your home, cabin, RV Camper, Tiny House; or Airbnb, office, store, or restaurant, this black soap dispenser bathroom wall mount and wall shampoo dispenser provides the ideal solution. These Refillable Dispensers are also easy to clean & refill and extremely user-friendly. | Brand Satisfaction: MaisoNovo is a Brooklyn-based, women-led small business that brings living to your homes with style. Our mission is to create modern, minimalist, and functional designs that help organize your home in a tasteful, and aesthetic way. Our fast-responding customer service team + unconditional Extended Warranty policy serve to provide satisfaction.
comment 1: I ordered other dispensers and had to return them. This was my next choice and it should have been my first choice. I love the quality and the pumps actually work! A beautiful addition to my master bathroom. Holds a lot of soap/shampoo/conditioner without leaking out. I am not using the mounts at this time but feel that if I did, they would be easy to install and would last. - Renee H
comment 2: These are such high quality and so far good on how they adhere to the shower tile. I would definitely recommend getting these. They make my shower look like a high end resort. Very easy to install. - Patricia
comment 3: super sturdy, left it for 24 hours and it’s ready to use. I was worried with the adhesive at first because it’s tiny, but actually, I didn’t need much. I’ve been pumping real hard but it won’t budge at all and on top of that, it looks slick and amazing. - batang quiapo
comment 4: Installed these in our guest bathroom. A very clean nice look. I wish they had an option for more simple labels. I ordered some off of Amazon to use instead of the ones that came with them. We ordered another set for our kids bathroom because we liked the way they looked and kept bottles off of the ledge of the shower. - Amazon Customer
comment 5: The quality of the bottles and the metal brackets far exceeded my expectations. These are incredible. We opted to purchase strong indoor/outdoor double sided tape from Ace Hardware instead of using the glue that came with it, to be safe in our rental. Seriously though, worth the purchase. - Zachary
